title: Nerf Junior Wild Sharkfire Easy Play Dart Blaster
features: NERF JUNIOR WILD SHARKFIRE EASY PLAY BLASTER: the Nerf Junior Wild Sharkfire blaster features a cool shark design to spark imaginative play
EASY PLAY BLASTER: the blaster has an easy play design, so children can enjoy exciting Nerf dart blasting play all on their own in indoor and outdoor games
EASY TO HOLD: this Nerf Junior foam blaster is sized to fit comfortably in small hands and has a lightweight design that's easy for children to hold and carry

EASY TO LOAD & BLAST: the blaster handle has the lowest pull force of any Nerf dart blaster, so it's easy for children to pull back by themselves. The darts insert easily into the front of the blaster
GREAT OUTDOOR TOYS FOR 6-YEAR-OLD BOYS AND GIRLS AND UP: Nerf Junior Wild dart blasters are fun toys for kids outdoor games and encourage physical and social play
description: Product Description Nerf Junior Wild blasters are designed with special features that make them easy to play with, so young children can enjoy playing with these wild-looking blasters all by themselves. They're easy to hold, sized to fit comfortably in small hands and lightweight for easy carrying in garden games. The front-loading design makes it easy to insert darts, and the handles have the lowest pull force of any Nerf dart blasters, for easy blasting. All these features let children experience the thrill of blasting all by themselves. They're perfect for boys and girls who are blasting into Nerf dart games for the first time. The Nerf Junior Wild Sharkfire blaster features a fearsome shark design that captures the look of this fierce fish with cool colours and exciting details! This Nerf shark blaster includes 8 Nerf Elite 2.0 flexible foam darts. Eyewear recommended (not included). Blasters each sold separately, subject to availability. Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro. Safety Warning Ages 6 and up TO AVOID EYE INJURY: WARNING: Do not aim at eyes or face. Use of eyewear recommended for players and people within range. Use only official Nerf darts. Other darts may not meet safety standards. Do not modify the darts or blaster.

specifications_table.Educational Objective(s): ‎Dexterity, Active Play, Social Development, Interactive Play, Motor Skills, Hand-eye Coordination
